attributes.name: vmin
attributes.description: Min. relative z-pos. for which the line characteristics will be calculated.

attributes.name: vmax
attributes.description: Max. relative z-pos. for which the line characteristics will be calculated.

attributes.name: anchorZ
attributes.description: Z-coordinate of the anchor in global coordinate system

attributes.name: maxTension
attributes.description:
Maximum tension to be used in the line characteristics
calculations

attributes.name: minHTension
attributes.description:
Minimum horizontal tension to be used for calculation
of line characteristics

attributes.name: npth
attributes.description: Number of points in the line characteristics matrix, offset variation in the horizontal plane.

attributes.name: nptv
attributes.description: Number of points in the line characteristics matrix, offset variation in the vertical plane.

attributes.name: slope
attributes.description: The angle of the seabed under the catenary line. Slope = 0 means a flat seabed. Positive slope means that the seabed is sloping downwards from the anchor towards the attachment point.
